description:
Azure Dragon of the East: Spring's Second Chance is the 2024 edition of Li Xi: an [END](https://endproject.xn--mk1bu44c) endeavor.  
  
The Tiger traversed thousands of miles of white snow.  
The green hills are not old; the beauty is still in the Moon.  
He drinks up the past and lays to sleep.  
  
The Jade Rabbit comes to repay your blessing with the Sound of Heart.  
The Rabbit became white and white again; the hills clear for the Rabbit to roam.  
There are flowers in your heart and sunshine tomorrow.  
Joys and sorrows illuminate all yearning, hear the echo from the road ahead.  
  
The future is like the sea; the future is long.  
A year's plan starts with Spring.  
  
May your dreams always shine in the long night, all wishes come true.
name: Azure Dragon of the East: Spring's Second Chance
